doc:
Lucien Littlefield https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lucien_Littlefield 0 Lucien Littlefield (August 16, 1895 – June 4, 1960) was an American actor who achieved a long career from silent films to the television era. He was noted for his versatility, playing a wide range of roles and already portraying old men before he was of voting age. Lucien_Littlefield ( August_16_,_1895 – June_4_,_1960 ) was an_American_actor who achieved a_long_career from silent_films to the_television_era . He was_noted for his_versatility , playing a_wide_range of roles and already_portraying old_men before he was of voting age .
